nodes.text: The olai was a powerfully-built beast of burden that was transported to the planet Redcap from a nearby moon.

The olai were originally bred to serve as pack animals to serve in the mines, but over time they became transports and mounts. Their heads were crowned with a pair of hollow, bulbous horns that were used in the fights that occurred during mating season. Their webbed feet were tipped with metallic claws which gave the olai good footing on the rocky ground of the mines.
